phrs.translation: 尾随, 挡板, 后挡板, 尾板
车尾野餐会, 车尾派对, 停车场野餐聚会, 车尾趴
后备箱门未关, 尾门打开

sentences.sentence: He routinely holds tailgate parties at Flyers games with 30 or 40 fans.
sentences.translation: 他经常与三四十个粉丝在飞跳比赛前举行车尾野餐会。

sentences.sentence: Two men got out, lowered the tailgate, and a torrent of bloodhounds poured from the truck bed.
sentences.translation: 两个人从车里走出，放下后挡板，一群警犬从货车的车厢里涌出来。

sentences.sentence: Tim Love says: "Because you’d get a lot of funny looks if you tried roasting a pumpkin at a tailgate instead of a pig."
sentences.translation: 蒂姆拉夫说：“如果你想在车尾野餐会上烤南瓜而不是烤猪，很多人会投来异样的目光。”
